description: Beautifully maintained 4 bedr 3.5 bath townhouse located in one of Burnabyâ€™s most desirable neighborhoods. Offering over 1700 sqft of thoughtfully designed living space. Ideal for growing families. Open-concept main floor features high ceilings & large windows that fill the space with natural light. The living and dining areas flow seamlessly, creating a perfect setting for entertaining or relaxing with loved ones. Upstairs spacious bedrooms including a generous primary suite with a walk-in closet and a private ensuite. Lower-level bdrm also includes an ensuite bathroom, making it a perfect option for a mortgage helper, guest suite, or home office. Conveniently situated just minutes from Metrotown, Central Park, SkyTrain, top-rated schools, and countless amenities. Open house 2-4pm Nov 1-2
